mapper.select: select distinct A.Material_ItemCode, B.Product_Item_Name Material_ItemName, (SELECT Material_LotNo FROM Raw_Material_tbl where Material_ItemCode = A.Material_ItemCode order by CreateDate desc limit 1) Material_LotNo, (SELECT Qty FROM Raw_Material_tbl where Material_ItemCode = A.Material_ItemCode order by CreateDate desc limit 1) Qty from Raw_Material_tbl A inner join Product_Info_tbl B on A.Material_ItemCode = B.Product_Item_Code where A.Production_LotNo = #{LotNo};

SELECT rmt.*, pit.Product_Item_Name Material_ItemName, pit.Product_Info_STND_1 Material_Item_Stnd_1, dt.Child_TBL_Type Material_Item_Material, dt2.Child_TBL_Type Material_Item_Clsfc_1, dt3.Child_TBL_Type Material_Item_Clsfc_2 FROM Raw_Material_tbl rmt INNER JOIN Product_Info_tbl pit ON rmt.Material_ItemCode = pit.Product_Item_Code INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt ON pit.Product_Material = dt.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt2 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_1 = dt2.Child_TBL_No INNER JOIN DTL_TBL dt3 ON pit.Product_Item_CLSFC_2 = dt3.Child_TBL_No WHERE rmt.Production_LotNo = #{LotNo}
